questions:
a. Man made things are made by *man*. (man/ nature)

b. Natural things occur naturally in *nature*. (man/ nature)

c. *Tree* is a natural thing. (park/ tree) 

d. *Cat* is not a man made thing. (bed/ cat)

e. Rose, sunflower and lilies are *natural* things. (man made/ natural)

f.  *Human* is a natural thing. (human/ computer)

g. *Computer* is an electronic device. (sofa/ computer)

params.textField:
1. Computer never makes mistakes: *accurate*
2. Computer needs electricity. *electronic*
3. Our *time* is saved due to uses of computer.
4. It makes our work *easy*.
5. It has large memory. *storage*
6. We can trust computer for many things. *reliable*
7. Computer is not a *natural* thing.
